text: Anyone can help me in making my app
Anyone who can make app for me
<@U2M0921GB> we're not here to hold your hand. Don't ask to ask.

attachments.fallback:
[October 7th, 2016 1:02 PM] vinothvino42: I’ve tab layout with three buttons below.

1.search button with listview (fragment)
2.favourite button with listviews(favourited list items only)(fragment)
3.setting button with one layout(switch,textviews)(fragment)

Totally I’ve 1 main activity to display the bottom buttons and framelayout to display my fragments. 4fragments(2 fragments for listview,1 for detailed description(detailed fragment),1 fragment with switch and textview)

If i click any list items in both search and favourite button then it’ll open detailed layout(textviews)

Here comes the problem, If I tap the switch(setting fragment) then i want to change the textview color in detailed fragment but my app force stopped automatically when I’m trying to set the color on textview. 

*java.lang.IllegalStateException: Fragment ContentFragment{35d3ea7} not attached to Activity*

Any help would be greatly appreciated!!

1.search button with listview (fragment)
2.favourite button with listviews(favourited list items only)(fragment)

Here comes the problem, If I tap the switch(setting fragment) then i want to change the textview color in detailed fragment but my app force stopped automatically when I’m trying to set the color on textview.

text:
Show us a fragment of code that triggers this error and code that adds a fragment (`getFragmentManager()...commit()`).
You're trying to do some action on a suspended fragment.
